name: Resize Pong
description:
RESIZE PONG 

The first person to get 5 points wins!

Every time you touch the ball you shrink!!!

Every time you earn point, you extend yourself!!!

The game is meant to be played with two players on one keyboard.

The  Controlls:

W & S:  To controller the Red Player.

Up & Down (Arrows): To controller the Blue Player.

Q or K: Launch the Ball to random direction!

Please leave feedback, it's my first game :) Have Fun!
